name: Don't Open Your Eyes
description:
Here it is! My first expirement indie Game.

Don't Open you Eyes is a Horro Game.

The Sound Effect is the most important Game mechanic in this game.

In this Game, You will be the Apartment Manager who have dark phobic. You need to repair the electric box in the night and use your hearing to know whether there are someone around you,

Listen to the background sound to figure out what happen in the night.
